item.title: Migrate Raspberry Pi SD card to SSD
item.description: Disk intensive applications such as kubernetes can run on Raspberry Pi 4, but you need to migrate from the SD card to an SSD drive. Raspberry Pi can boot from USB, so you don’t have to wear out your SD card anymore. This is what you need to configure your raspberry pi: A USB3 SATA or M.2 case SSD disk Os already installed on the old SD card Set up Boot up your rpi4 on the SD card.
